name: D.A.F. Destroy All Fascists
description:
The fascists are marching again. Grab your baseball bat and magic power cards and show them that they are not welcome!

A tiny card based puzzle game with 8 levels.

Made in a week for the gotm.io game jam.

How to play

The goal is to clear the level of all fascists. Each turn you can select cards to move your character (or perform special abilities). 

Move

To move your character, you have to select a movement card (dark red) and then plot a path for the character. Clink on the character, and draw a path. 

You can only move along the same type of enemy . Some cards allow you move straight, some allow you move diagonally (or both) ...

When you are happy with your path, click the move button above the selected card.

Enemy attack

Each round one type of fascists preparing an attack. At the end of the turn, if the player is on a field adjacent to this enemy type, they take damage (if they don't have a shield).

DAF mode

Each level there is a condition to unlock the powerful DAF mode, which replaces your deck with one DAF card. With this card, you can easily reach your goal: Destroy all fascists :)
